title: Crisis - which crisis? Israel-Iran another huge challenge for government
description: As buildings burn in Tehran and Tel Aviv, the UK government is facing another crisis, writes Laura Kuenssberg.
content:
On a normal weekend, MPs might try to snatch a bit of downtime, or squeeze in a game of pin the tail on the donkey at a constituency summer fete. 
Ministers might be ploughing through documents in t… [+7672 chars]
